quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.

quote: If Heaven exists, to know that there's laughter, that would be a great thing.

quote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: The truth. It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and must therefore be treated with great caution.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: It's hard to be humble, when you're as great as I am.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: I listen to Helmet - and I love Helmet, they're a great band - but every song sounds the same.
name: Adam Jones

quote: The rage for railroads is so great that many will be laid in parts where they will not pay.
name: George Stephenson

quote: Great ideas originate in the muscles.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Produce great men, the rest follows.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is small.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
name: Mae West

quote: Mother Nature is the great equalizer. You can't get away from it.
name: Christopher Heyerdahl

quote: Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee, and I'll forgive Thy great big joke on me.
name: Robert Frost

quote: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as you dominant aspiration.
name: James Allen

quote: It's great to be queen!
name: Helen Mirren

quote: All great empires die from within.
name: Terry Bradshaw

quote: I can't even explain how blessed I am and how fortunate that I have such a great team that believes in me.
name: Holly Holm

quote: In any great organization it is far, far safer to be wrong with the majority than to be right alone.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: With great power comes great responsibility. These are platforms with hundreds of millions of people.
name: Dave McClure

quote: A great man is made up of qualities that meet or make great occasions.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: I had a wonderful life and was blessed with so many loving people and great friends.
name: James Arness

quote: Some very poor countries run great vaccination systems, and some richer ones run terrible programs.
name: Bill Gates

quote: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people.
name: Huey Newton

quote: I have talked with great men, and I do not see how they differ from others.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Great leaders don't need to act tough. Their confidence and humility serve to underscore their toughness.
name: Simon Sinek

quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Trust men and they will be true to you; treat them greatly and they will show themselves great.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Great artists suffer for the people.
name: Marvin Gaye

quote: Canada is like a loft apartment over a really great party.
name: Robin Williams

quote: I believe in the fundamental truth of all great religions of the world.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It was great. I mean, it's a blast directing underwater stuff.
name: David R. Ellis

quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities - brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: Sometimes, it's just great to bring new people into the mix.
name: John Oates

quote: A great man is one who leaves others at a loss after he is gone.
name: Paul Valery

quote: That's the great thing about a tractor. You can't really hear the phone ring.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: A dream is the bearer of a new possibility, the enlarged horizon, the great hope.
name: Howard Thurman

quote: You are that vast thing that you see far, far off with great telescopes.
name: Alan Watts

quote: I wasn't born with a silver spoon in Beverly Hills, but I was born with a great deal of self-worth.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: To accomplish great things we must first dream, then visualize, then plan... believe... act!
name: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: My dad was such a great story-teller, a good teacher.
name: Grace Poe

quote: Sunglasses are great, but I always feel a bit pretentious wearing sunglasses. I mean, I do love to wear them.
name: Daphne Guinness

quote: Go for great. Own your game. Be kind. Get big things done.
name: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: Any great warrior is also a scholar, and a poet, and an artist.
name: Steven Seagal

quote: Character may be manifested in the great moments, but it is made in the small ones.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: Failure is nature's plan to prepare you for great responsibilities.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Brevity is a great charm of eloquence.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
name: Joe Paterno

quote: He was a great patriot, a humanitarian, a loyal friend; provided, of course, he really is dead.
name: Voltaire

quote: Great moments are born from great oppurtunities.
name: Herb Brooks

quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
name: Demosthenes

quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
name: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: I think journalism is a great way to do public service, to have an impact on your community.
name: Bob Schieffer

quote: We make a great mistake in supposing all people are capable of self-government.
name: John C. Calhoun

quote: Anything created by human beings is already in the great book of nature.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: It's not about my career now. It's just about finding great work and having a good time.
name: Melanie Griffith

quote: Spreading manure is a great way of bringing yourself down to earth.
name: Steven Ford

quote: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Do not say a little in many words but a great deal in a few.
name: Pythagoras

quote: A lot of vets like 'Good Morning Vietnam' - I get great letters from guys.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
name: Stella Young

quote: The great instrument of moral good is the imagination.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: I have a lot of great memories, but I can't imagine anything more exciting than the life I have now.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: I think if there's a great depression there might be some hope.
name: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: A retentive memory may be a good thing, but the ability to forget is the true token of greatness.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Sydney's a beautiful city. It was a great experience.
name: Barbara Hershey

quote: The target for every great champion is to play for the team.
name: Antonio Conte

quote: A great empire, like a great cake, is most easily diminished at the edges.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: How great are the dangers I face to win a good name in Athens.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: To have a great idea, have a lot of them.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: There never was a truly great man that was not at the same time truly virtuous.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Throughout my career, I was blessed with great teams and great teammates.
name: Roger Craig

quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: We all have an edge. We all are floating our psyche on top with a great ocean underneath.
name: Brad Dourif

quote: I live for my daughter. Every decision I make is about her and for her. It's great. She's perfect.
name: Gareth Gates

quote: The old days were the old days. And they were great days. But now is now.
name: Don Rickles

quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great will power.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Behind every great fortune lies a great crime.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Every great work makes the human face more admirable and richer, and that is its whole secret.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The salesman knows nothing of what he is selling save that he is charging a great deal too much for it.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I woke up and realized life is great and people are awesome and life is worth living.
name: Hulk Hogan

quote: And your very flesh shall be a great poem.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Taking risks and being focused, sometimes, are at odds. Both are required to build a great company.
name: Andy Dunn

quote: Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Eventually, I think Chicago will be the most beautiful great city left in the world.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: That's one of the great things about Thanksgiving: Football's on!
name: Michael Strahan

quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience.
name: Kevin Rudd

quote: A great trademark is appropriate, dynamic, distinctive, memorable and unique.
name: Primo Angeli

quote: To have great poets, there must be great audiences.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: The great lesson my mother and father gave me was almost invisible. It was a strong sense of being rooted.
name: Dan Rather

quote: Most people would succeed in small things if they were not troubled with great ambitions.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Habit is a great deadener.
name: Samuel Beckett

quote: For the person for whom small things do not exist, the great is not great.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: I have great hopes that we shall love each other all our lives as much as if we had never married at all.
name: Lord Byron

quote: I am not a pig farmer. The pigs had a great time, but I didn't make any money.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: Life is hard. Not great. Kind of tragic.
name: T. J. Miller

quote: The great test of life is obedience to God.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: To stay a great singer or guitar player, you've got to do it 24/7. That's what I do.
name: Sammy Hagar

quote: We love what we love, and shared fandoms bring people of all ages and backgrounds into one great tribe.
name: Margaret Stohl

quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
name: Leo Burnett

quote: Ethiopia is such a great country, beautiful place.
name: Flea

quote: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Ninety-nine percent of the people in the world are fools and the rest of us are in great danger of contagion.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Any great art is meant to illuminate the human condition.
name: Sterling K. Brown

quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience.
name: Kimbal Musk

quote: It takes a great man to give sound advice tactfully, but a greater to accept it graciously.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: A sense of humor is great - it goes a long, long way in a marriage.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Life in abundance comes only through great love.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Small communities grow great through harmony, great ones fall to pieces through discord.
name: Sallust

quote: It is the nature of all greatness not to be exact.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: There would be no great men if there were no little ones.
name: George Herbert

quote: All great novels, all true novels, are bisexual.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: Maybe I'm not a great man but I damn well want to break the record.
name: Roger Maris

quote: The world's great men have not commonly been great scholars, nor its great scholars great men.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I've had two great loves: my mother and my daughter.
name: Viv Albertine

quote: Great things are won by great dangers.
name: Herodotus

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good for the great.
name: Kenny Rogers

quote: We grow small trying to be great.
name: E. Stanley Jones

quote: And what he greatly thought, he nobly dared.
name: Homer

quote: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: Be great in act, as you have been in thought.
name: Jean Paul

quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
name: Walter Bagehot

quote: The most characteristic mark of a great mind is to choose some one important object, and pursue it for life.
name: Anna Letitia Barbauld

quote: The appearance of a single great genius is more than equivalent to the birth of a hundred mediocrities.
name: Cesare Lombroso

quote: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
name: Charles de Saint-Évremond
